2.20
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(infer)
library(readr)
pillbug <- read_table("data/data/pillbug.txt")


pillbug |>
  group_by(group) |>
  summarize(mean(time))
```
Opgave 3.8
```{r}
library(readr)
cats <- read_csv("data/data/cats.txt")

ggplot(data=cats, mapping = aes(x = Bwt))+aes(y=Hwt)+geom_point()+geom_smooth()

lm(Hwt ~ Bwt, data = cats)
lm(Hwt ~ I(Bwt- mean(Bwt)), data = cats)



```
